title: Train Otaku 4 Life!
content: I can't believe the old Japan map is back in v1.0. This is epic!

title: Wii U Memes
content: We gather to mourn the Wii U, but it's still goated. Right?

title: Artist for hire
content: Just discovered the new Creative Builder class in v4.0. Gonna build so many sculptures!

title: Cedar Point hype!
content: v6.0 has the best map so far, I'm launching people off coasters daily. #TheRideNeverEnds

title: Windows Me Desktop
content: Yes it's still crashing but I love it. #ArchivistLife

title: Unexpected Delays Are Real
content: In v8.0, I'm actually missing trains because they're so realistic. Is that good or bad?

title: Rodin Typeface?
content: Finally it's nerfed. Tired of glitching the UI. #CoderProbs

title: Collector's Paradise
content: GameCube shrine and Wii Remote combos. This museum is dope!

title: No more server crashes!
content: The Redstone Engineer patch is stable now. #Finally #BetaNoMore

title: GameCube durability buffed!
content: Now I last longer in Japan maps. #PeakConsole

title: Trains now delay realistically
content: This is both amazing and frustrating... #Immersion

title: Wii Remote weapon is OP!
content: Swing and destroy! Just hope it doesn't desync mid-combo :)

title: Memory Sync is way smoother!
content: Now I can transition between past and present without lag!

title: Miiverse when?
content: Why don't Nintendo bring back Miiverse to Switch 2? Glad that we have it in our game.

title: Millennium Force is peak!
content: And with the latest patch, its even more peak!!!!

title: Dolphin Mode fixed!
content: No more being stuck in GameCube transformation forever. #DolphinFTW

title: Fixed Katsuta's infinite loop bug
content: I was trapped for 3 hours in Katsuta Station. Glad it's finally patched!

title: New buffs for console gamers!
content: Nintendo players got a speed buff, PlayStation players got nerfed. Justice!

title: Train schedules finally work!
content: No more teleporting trains. Thank you devs! #RealismMatters

title: Got the Launch Title Collector achievement!
content: Only took me like 100 hours in this game, but totally worth it.
